original_title: 欲求不満な隣のお姉さんと巣ごもりセックスに明け暮れた日々。
overview: A new virus that has caused unprecedented chaos around the world. For the past year, I have only met remotely with my lover who lives abroad. I haven't had sex in a year. I'm a woman, too... I couldn't get someone I liked to hold me, so I was frustrated and dealing with it alone. At that time, he started to talk because he was shared with a young man who lived next door. His friendly smile made my heart flutter for a moment.
title: The Days When I Spent All My Time Holed Up Fucking The Sexually Frustrated Girl Next Door. Kana Kusakabe
